title: Man of the Mountain
description: Lord knows he'd warned her. Warned Eden Parker that he was a Jones male through and through -- surly as a skinned rattler and nothing but trouble for the cutest, mouthiest do-gooder ever to set foot in town. Though Eden had single-handedly rehabilitated his daddy's tumbledown saloon, no way would she renovate Jared's busted dreams or ramshackle heart.But Eden at long last found someone to love in the ornery lumberjack come down from the hills. And with a little help from the notorious Joneses, the leggy redhead became a posse of one-out to lasso her man!
author: Christine Rimmer
